context.rdfs:comment: A particular physical business or branch of an organization. Examples of LocalBusiness include a restaurant, a particular branch of a restaurant chain, a branch of a bank, a medical practice, a club, a bowling alley, etc.
context.rdfs:label: LocalBusiness

properties.rdfs:comment: The price range of the business, for example $$$.
properties.rdfs:label: priceRange

properties.rdfs:comment: The larger organization that this local business is a branch of, if any. Not to be confused with (anatomical)branch.
properties.rdfs:label: branchOf

properties.rdfs:comment: Cash, Credit Card, Cryptocurrency, Local Exchange Tradings System, etc.
properties.rdfs:label: paymentAccepted

properties.rdfs:comment:
The currency accepted.

Use standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. "USD"; Ticker symbol for cryptocurrencies e.g. "BTC"; well known names for Local Exchange Tradings Systems (LETS) and other currency types e.g. "Ithaca HOUR".
properties.rdfs:label: currenciesAccepted
